title: BD Crypto
author: BD Crypto
created_time: March 23, 2023, 05:05:26 AMLast edit: March 23, 2023, 09:13:53 AM by BD Crypto
content: What Happened: Today I saw a Fake arbitrum Airdrop Ongoing in Social Sites and they are also selling ARB tokens. Their ‚óè Pre-sale price: 1 ETH = 50,000 $ARB . I think New users can unfortunately join this types of scams and lose their hard earned money. So I suggest never trust this types of scams anyway. They are just here to make fool crypto neew comers and scam them. So always be aware because in crypto world there are a lot of scammers trying to throw you into traps.Fake Airdrop And Presale Website Link: https://airdrop.arbitram.io/gMP3Website Archive: https://archive.ph/8xRjLFake Presale Address: 0xa4ca7C78407247A603216345752e9f4041423cdeThis address contains 8.239839839703950966 ETH . I think already some people joined this scam Presale Event. Their minimum purchase 0.1 Eth and Maximum Purchase 10 Eth If someone look at their website properly he can see the website link is Arbitram which is obviously a fake website.Arbitrum Real Website: https://arbitrum.foundation/ Here you can see the Presale Address and it's Price.Here clearly Said that the Pre-sale price is 1 ETH = 50,000 $ARB. The minimum purchase is 0.1 ETH, and the maximum purchase is 10 ETH.Here is the details of this Fake Airdrop. So everyone always be aware and be Safe.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: We have existing discussion that is going on about Arbitrum fake airdrops on scam accusation thread, you can also contribute there instead of creating another topic about the fake airdrops. This is the thread that I am talking about: [Scam alert] Fake Arbitrum airdrop claim website..You can join the discussion too instead of creating new thread about the present fake airdrop which can lead to stealing of coins on the wallets used to connect to the fake airdrop site.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: BD Crypto on March 23, 2023, 05:05:26 AMWhat Happened: Today I saw a Fake arbitrum Airdrop Ongoing in Social Sites and they are also selling ARB tokens. This address contains 8.239839839703950966 ETH . I think already some people joined this scam Presale Event. Their minimum purchase 0.1 Eth and Maximum Purchase 10 Eth Whatever the scam method may be easy for someone to discover, you will find that there are beginners who have already connected their wallets and lost their assets due to their lack of experience in the field and because of their haste and not taking enough time to conduct research, when the scammers learn that there is a project that has already launched an airdrop for the participants on its network, or it may be launched in the future, they create phishing websites for the respective project to mislead the participants so that they connect their wallets to the wrong site and fall into the traps, and of course, you will not find one phishing site only, but thousands of scam and phishing sites, and even the scammers promote their phishing sites with their money until their scam sites appear for the largest category of people, so we should all warn people to keep the crypto community safe.
